//ShortFuse, Glitch, Kirbeast, USB Loader GX Team Brawl Themed Project+ ilikepizza107 w/ credit to the P+DT 2.3.2 202301311200 Brawl Themed Project+ Launcher HOLD A FOR LAUNCHER MENU
Brawl Themed Project+ is a mod of Project+ with the gameplay and QoL of P+ and the asthetics of Brawl. This mod would not be possible without the longstanding support of the Brawl Modding community. Thank you for playing!
